title: THOUGHT / BORING COP
description: Drama informs you are a Boring Cop.

dialogueTree.title: Drama: "Wow, so someone's been a little......"
dialogueTree.text: Wow, so someone's been a little... *boring*?

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Drama: "Yes, my *standard* liege. Someone's..."
links.text: Yes, my *standard* liege. Someone's seen all sorts of wild ideas pop off and thought -- 'I'll take the *boring* one. The regular, please. The brown.'

links.title: You: "I like brown."
links.text: I like brown.

links.title: Drama: "Of course you do. And maybe some bl..."
links.text: Of course you do. And maybe some black shoes or a pristine white shirt to go with that. It's official: My lord's *copotype* is Regular Cop. I'll let everyone know. I'll send out a telefax.

links.title: You: "Wait, wait -- this will be my *copo..."
links.text: Wait, wait -- this will be my *copotype* now?

links.title: Drama: "Yes, the type of cop you are, sire...."
links.text: Yes, the type of cop you are, sire. Think of it as a caste, a *class*, even. A nation of Regular Law Officials that you belong to. It comes, of course, with the *usual* benefits.

links.title: You: "Why not. Send out the telefax then...."
links.text: Why not. Send out the telefax then. I'm not ashamed. (Opt in.)

links.title: Drama: "Done and done. No actual *communiqu..."
links.text: Done and done. No actual *communiques* will be sent, of course. That would be too dramatic.

links.title: You: "Yeah, no need. Let's keep that anno..."
links.text: Yeah, no need. Let's keep that announcement on standby for now. (Opt out.)

links.title: Drama: "Good, good. Of course. To outright..."
links.text: Good, good. Of course. To outright declare yourself something does seem a bit too... *interesting* now, doesn't it? I won't trouble you any further.

links.title: You: "I like standards."
links.text: I like standards.

links.title: Drama: "Of course you do. Maybe some *regul..."
links.text: Of course you do. Maybe some *regulations* and a *usual* pistol to go with them? It's official: My lord's *copotype* is Regular Cop. I'll let everyone know. I'll send out a telefax.

links.title: You: "Look, I'm just trying to do my job,..."
links.text: Look, I'm just trying to do my job, no need for extravagance.

links.title: Drama: "Of course you do. Let's get right t..."
links.text: Of course you do. Let's get right to it. My lord's *copotype* is Regular Cop. I'll let everyone know. I'll send out a telefax.

links.title: You: "What is this? Picking on me for not..."
links.text: What is this? Picking on me for not being *crazy* enough? That's the LEAST of my concerns.

links.title: Drama: "No need to be defensive. The regula..."
links.text: No need to be defensive. The regularity, the brownness, the *cut-and-dry* have their appeal -- a very *standard* appeal.

links.title: You: ""Kim. Am I boring?""
links.text: "Kim. Am I boring?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You?" He looks at you. "I wouldn't..."
links.text: "You?" He looks at you. "I wouldn't worry about that."

links.title: Drama: "See? You're so *regular* and vinyl-..."
links.text: See? You're so *regular* and vinyl-brown, he doesn't even want to talk to you about it.

links.title: You: "No, I'm not. Get outta here! [Finis..."
links.text: No, I'm not. Get outta here! [Finish thought.]
